text: Luka Đorđević (Cyrillic: Лукa Ђорђевић; born 9 July 1994) is a Montenegrin professional association football player. == Career == He played for FK Mogren in the 2011/2012 season. He played 24 league matches with the club, and made one appearance in a UEFA Champions League qualification match against PFC Litex Lovech. He made his first appearance with Zenit St. Petersburg on 11 August 2012 against Spartak Moscow.CDM Beta - Sport - Fudbal - Zenit razbio Spartak, debitovao Luka Djordjevic (Serbian) Retrieved August 11, 2012. On 22 July 2017, he was loaned to FC Arsenal Tula. He played his first international match for Montenegro on 27 August 2012 against San Marino. He also scored his first international goal in that match.Vijesti - Fudbal - Crna Gora ubjedljiva protiv San Marina - autsajder potopljen sa 6:0 (Serbian) Retrieved September 11, 2012. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League League League Cup Cup Continental Continental Other Other Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Mogren 2010–11 Montenegrin First League 2 0 0 0 0 0 – – 2 0 Mogren 2011–12 Montenegrin First League 24 10 2 0 1 0 – – 27 10 Mogren Total Total 26 10 2 0 1 0 0 0 29 10 Zenit St. Petersburg 2012–13 Russian Premier League 7 0 2 0 1 0 – – 10 0 Zenit St. Petersburg 2013–14 Russian Premier League 1 0 – – 0 0 – – 1 0 Zenit St. Petersburg 2014–15 Russian Premier League 0 0 – – 0 0 – – 0 0 Zenit St. Petersburg 2015–16 Russian Premier League 0 0 – – – – – – 0 0 Zenit St. Petersburg 2016–17 Russian Premier League 10 1 1 1 6 1 1 0 18 3 Zenit St. Petersburg 2017–18 Russian Premier League 0 0 – – – – – – 0 0 Zenit St. Petersburg Total Total 18 1 3 1 7 1 1 0 29 3 Twente 2013–14 Eredivisie 14 0 1 0 – – – – 15 0 Jong Twente 2013–14 Eerste Divisie 5 1 – – – – – – 5 1 Sampdoria 2014–15 Serie A 3 0 2 0 – – – – 5 0 Zenit-2 St. Petersburg 2015–16 FNL 2 0 – – – – – – 2 0 Ponferradina 2015–16 Segunda División 24 3 2 1 – – – – 26 4 Arsenal Tula 2017–18 Russian Premier League 22 7 1 0 – – – – 23 7 Arsenal Tula 2018–19 Russian Premier League 23 7 4 2 – – – – 27 9 Arsenal Tula Total Total 45 14 5 2 0 0 0 0 50 16 Career total Career total Career total 137 29 15 4 8 1 1 0 161 34 ===International=== Montenegro Montenegro Montenegro Montenegro Year Apps Goals 2012 2 1 2014 2 0 2017 3 0 2018 4 0 Total 11 1 ===International goals=== #
